entry.title: You’ve Got Mail
entry.summary:
Author: 79KJ01

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,082Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 1

Summary: It starts with a runaway. Buck, angry and desperate to be seen, flees Hershey, Pennsylvania to find his sister Maddie in Boston—only to be turned away by her abusive boyfriend. Lost in a city he doesn’t know, he meets a boy his age on vacation with his family: Eddie Diaz. One conversation turns into an exchange of addresses, and one letter becomes a lifeline.Through years of growing pains, deployments, heartbreak, and dreams deferred, Buck and Eddie write to each other. They grow from teenagers to adults—Buck chasing purpose across the country, Eddie becoming a father and a soldier. Their letters span love, loss, fear, and hope. Unspoken truths linger in ink, and timing never seems to be on their side.Until it is.

entry.title: Lighthouse
entry.summary:
Author: KilldevilandtheWildThings

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 201,252Chapters: 34/35Kudos: 1,337

Summary: Buck had lost-- he was sure of this now. His resolve only lasted a few weeks before his exterior began to crack; he was never a very good actor. He couldn’t keep up the greetings and the asking questions and the easy stroll. He let his shoulders creep up to his ears, let his foot tap incessantly. He did what his Captain told him, but stopped asking for anything more. Stopped following the conversation in the back of the engine on the way to the call; he just stared out the window, thinking about the case to come, preparing for it. When he woke every morning, there was no big recovery milestone to strive for, no big fight for the soul of his career to win. Not even the happy swell of being back on shift -- something so easy to dismiss, that had dominated so much of his life, that he had taken for granted-- that had catalyzed him each morning of his first week back.An old habit of his had returned. A bad habit.~~or: after the lawsuit, buck confronts what it was he wanted all along. he looks and looks and longs for it; the team looks right through him. buck breaks-- right down the middle.

entry.title: you're ready, born ready
entry.summary:
Author: odysseus_calls

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 30,254Chapters: 6/10Kudos: 465

Summary: Eddie looks back and forth between Buck and the girl, staring skeptically at one another— like they’re looking in a funhouse mirror. The girl opens her mouth to say something but shuts it, eyes widening. She gulps. Oh god. Oh god, Eddie thinks, as he watches Buck and this teenager form their differing features into the same expression. “Uh, hi. Are you Evan Buckley?” she asks finally. She seems to know the answer, but Buck nods slowly. “Well, my name is Quinn Buckley.” Any remaining sound in the room is sucked out, and they’re left in a vacuum. Everyone is frozen. “I’m your daughter.” Buck, Eddie, and Chris have almost found their status quo, when the arrival of a surprise daughter shakes things up.

entry.title: What the Gods Leave Behind
entry.summary:
Author: mauradersfangirl

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,793Chapters: 17/25Kudos: 38

Summary: Evan Buckley, son of Apollo, thought he walked away from the war-torn world of demigods long ago. After losing too many siblings—some to prophecy, some to divine apathy—he ran toward the mortal world, firefighting, and something resembling peace.But LA is waking up. Monsters are coming more frequently. The Mist is thinning. Something—or someone—is hunting demigods again.And when Percy Jackson shows up at the edge of another broken call, bleeding and grim-faced, Buck knows he can’t outrun the war any longer.

entry.title: tell me what you need
entry.summary:
Author: weewooforever

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,612Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 68

Summary: It was supposed to be a one-time thing. He’d asked Buck for sex that day because he was desperate and looking for something to relax him. He thought it would burn off the need, get it out of his system. But it hasn’t. Not even fucking close. He can’t stop thinking about that night—how Buck touched him, how he kissed him, how he moved inside him like he owned him. It’s in his head all the time now, crowding every quiet moment. He wants it again. He wants him again. And that want? It’s starting to feel less like a leftover impulse and more like a craving he doesn’t know how to quit. OReddie gives buck everything he needs.

entry.title: He's not yours to break.
entry.summary:
Author: myelevanthreason

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,344Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 22

Summary: April 17th. The day it all went wrong. The worst call to ever happen happened to the 118. They were called into a lab with a deadly virus, everyone made it out alive, well except one person. Their beloved captain, Bobby Nash died while saving his team. Everyone in the 118 was devastated about Bobby’s death. It hit all of them like a brick, some more than others.El Paso, Texas. It was a sunny and calm day. Eddie had been spending the day with Christopther and it was an amazing day, being able to finally spend time with his son.It was about 10 pm, Chris had gone to sleep and Eddie decided to just relax on the couch for a few hours before he went to sleep. Then. His phone rang.The caller I.D read, Tommy Kinard. That’s weird. Why the hell was Tommy calling him? He’d been ignoring him ever since Tommy and Buck broke up. He decides to pick up the phone.

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,242Chapters: 29/29Kudos: 70

Summary: Eddie is a cynical, sharp-tongued beekeeper who’s perfectly happy living alone with his bees and his books on a quiet mountainside. People annoy him. Especially tourists. Especially loud, cheerful ones who park their camper van too close to his driveway.So when Buck—an endlessly sunny, chatty travel vlogger—rolls into town with a bright yellow van and an even brighter smile, Eddie’ peaceful life is over. Or at least, severely disrupted.

entry.title: too much to lose
entry.summary:
Author: rizcriz

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,667Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 314

Summary: It’s not a conscious thought.Not him. Anyone but him.He doesn’t mean it. He doesn’t want to lose any of them—but it’s flitting to the front of his mind and he can’t even stop it, is the thing. And maybe, some awful, heartbroken part of him—this little thing inside of him that he’s been so scared to acknowledge—knows why, but it doesn’t stop the wave of guilt.He doesn’t want to lose any of them.And they’re all in that building.And one of them is dead.And all he can think is—not him. Anyone but him.

entry.title: He Knows Everybody's Disapproval, I Should've Worshipped Him Sooner
entry.summary:
Author: Supernatural_911Marvel

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,828Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 21

Summary: Buck sits at the far end of the table in the 118 firehouse, the flickering overhead lights almost mocking the silence in the room. His fingers tap lightly against the table, a nervous rhythm he can’t stop, the sound of it strangely loud in the otherwise quiet space.It’s just another day, another shift, but everything feels different now. The hum of the coffee machine and the soft murmur of conversations in the kitchen area are the only sounds filling the space. Buck glances over at Hen, Chimney, and Bobby, who are talking quietly amongst themselves. They don’t look his way. They don’t acknowledge his presence.----Or, Post-Lawsuit Buck is excluded and breaks.

entry.title: My bloody steps leave a trail (I beg you to follow)
entry.summary:
Author: That_humanpersonthing

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,172Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 25

Summary: What if Eddie wasn't ok after Chris left. What if his days started with a practiced smile, and scratches on his thighs so he could feel something other then the numbness. To make him feel something, after being left with nothing when his son walked out the door. What if Eddie saw no hope in getting what he wanted back, he made a plan.Or what if Eddie gives himself two weeks to ensure everything will be ok, and then he'll be gone.

entry.title: Stay A Little Longer, Cowboy
entry.summary:
Author: inkanschaos

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,671Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 12

Summary: When Buck inherits a rundown patch of Texas land from an uncle he barely remembers, he figures he’ll sell it and get back to L.A. in time for the weekend surf. But the land comes with a stubborn gate, a small-town welcome committee that already thinks he’s married, and one very complicated cowboy named Eddie Diaz.Eddie’s got a ranch, a seven-year-old son who’s already attached, and a past he doesn’t like to talk about. Buck’s got a city-boy attitude, jeans that fit a little too well, and no clue how to fix a tractor. Or a fence. Or his feelings.
